canvases.label: Risalah-i Hadjdji Zihri Isfahani, Dar Fann-i Musiki. Five short treatises on music., ff.1r-2v

metadata.value: Risalah-i Hadjdji Zihri Isfahani, Dar Fann-i Musiki
metadata.label: Title

metadata.value: View of pages from the Risalah-i Hadjdji Zihri Isfahani, Dar Fann-i Musiki. Attributed to Hussain Zihri Isfahani, the Risalah-i Hadjdji Zihri Isfanani contains five short treatises on music, mostly from India. Although the first treatise seems to be original, the rest seem to have been translated from the Sanskrit. The manuscript is severely damaged, with many of the pages torn and bent.
metadata.label: Description

metadata.value: Risalah-i Hadjdji Zihri Isfahani, Dar Fann-i Musiki. Five short treatises on music., ff.1r-2v

metadata.value: Risalah-i Hadjdji Zihri Isfahani, Dar Fann-i Musiki.
metadata.label: Title

metadata.value: View of pages from the Risalah-i Hadjdji Zihri Isfahani, Dar Fann-i Musiki. Attributed to Hussain Zihri Isfahani, the Risalah-i Hadjdji Zihri Isfanani contains five short treatises on music, mostly from India. Although the first treatise seems to be original, the rest seem to have been translated from the Sanskrit.
metadata.label: Description
